column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////#50 Beef tenderloin & blue cheese - So damn good. I wish I could have an entire steak of this
column2: but unfortunately it comes with 2 small medallions. Perfectly cooked
column3: it'll make your knees buckle. Must order. It comes with potato chips (homemade?) which are good to munch on but nothing to write home about. Not ideal for big groups
column5: because of the small serving size.
